conference: International Conference on High Performance Computing, Data, and Analytics
notes: Selected papers will be invited to publish in JPDC. The past_papers and past_citations statistics below are under-counted because of a few missing years on the IEEE conference page. This is the second year using the rebuttal process, which was found to be very helpful with borderline papers, although probably only a small number of decisions were affected. 42 papers were accepted, but one was withdrawn.
